data.title: Footprint Center launching new lineup of local foods for 2024 WNBA All-Star Game
data.meta_description: The 2024 WNBA All-Star Game is in downtown Phoenix on July 20 and chefs at Footprint Center present exciting new menu items for fans to enjoy.
data.text:
The WNBA All Star Game is in downtown Phoenix this year on July 20. The Footprint Center will welcome some of the biggest names in women's basketball like Diana Taurasi, Caitlin Clark and Angel Reese, plus thousands of fans during the three-day long celebration.

In anticipation of the game and related events, the team at OVG Hospitality, the official food and beverage partner of Footprint Center, has put together a brand-new concessions menu for fans attending the game.

"We're not just sticking to the hot dog and chicken tenders mainstream menu items that you might find in a lot of different sports venues. We're pushing the envelope," said OVG Hospitality senior chef Otis Huemmer.

With the hype and excitement around women's basketball seemingly at an all-time high, Huemmer said it has become more important than ever to provide good food at this year's All-Star Game.

New food items at Footprint Center for the WNBA All-Star Game

Many of the items that will be served at Footprint Center use ingredients from local partnerships such as Embers Chocolate, Honeymoon Sweets, Schriener's Fine Sausages and beef from Prescott-based K4 Ranch.

Here's a look at some of the new items available at Footprint Center for the WNBA All-Star Game:

Two-foot-long Sonoran dog: a two-foot-long hot dog topped with chorizo, pineapple pico de gallo and cilantro creme.

Frybread tacos: chicken al pastor and beef barbacoa wrapped in frybread, topped with lettuce, pico de gallo, guacamole, pinto beans and cilantro creme. There is also a vegan option available using Beyond Meat.

Carne asada fries: crispy fries topped with carne asada, queso blanco, pico de gallo and cilantro creme.

Apple fritter pulled pork sandwich: BBQ pulled pork drenched in prickly pear BBQ sauce between two apple fritters and topped with crimson slaw.

Sonoran burger: K4 Ranch beef patty topped with roasted poblanos, jalape√±o bacon, guacamole and panela queso.

Ice cream sandwich: vanilla ice cream between two glazed Randy's Donuts.

2024 WNBA All-Star Game at Footprint Center

The 2024 WNBA All-Star Game will begin at 5:30 p.m. on Saturday, July 20 at Footprint Center in downtown Phoenix.

Footprint Center: 201 E. Jefferson St., Phoenix. footprintcenter.com.

Reach the reporter at endia.fontanez@gannett.com. Follow @EndiaFontanez on X, formerly Twitter.
